column4: Hi, is anybody here willing to help me with some questions concerning ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS, especially about screen and java?
I've used screen some, but recently i've started using tmux and haven't looked back.
So is this a yes or do you want me to look for someone else? :)
well, if you're wanting java help, then definitely someone else.  :-)  maybe even in #java or something.
